about_the_game:
Thank you for looking into donating to Expedition 13, all donations go directly towards our development fund to our developement and hosting!
Please note that this DLC does not contain any ingame content although donators do get the following benefits:

- Your donation means development can speed up significantly
- Be allowed to chastise contributors for not working hard enough for a month
- Be given permanent access to the Beta branch on Steam

*Please note that this DLC does not contain any ingame content and does not include any licenced works in any way or form.
detailed_description:
Donations?

Ofcourse donations are controversial at best. However all donations are publicized (anonymously) and expenditures are publicly logged on our discord! All donations will always go towards development and hosting.


About the Game

Thank you for looking into donating to Expedition 13, all donations go directly towards our development fund to our developement and hosting! Please note that this DLC does not contain any ingame content although donators do get the following benefits: - Your donation means development can speed up significantly - Be allowed to chastise contributors for not working hard enough for a month - Be given permanent access to the Beta branch on Steam *Please note that this DLC does not contain any ingame content and does not include any licenced works in any way or form.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 1.5ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: IGPU
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Latest
  • Processor: 3ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 650M 1 GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: 2ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: IGPU
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 650M 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
